content: with a provisional length and 64 stitches circumference cast on cast on 32 stitches work a flk toe on 1+11+8+11+1 divide your work into 32 instep stitches and 32 sole stitches stitches pick up 32 sole stitches the instep stitches are the beginning of your round from provisional cast on with cc knit 1 row in the round i need a mini-gusset for my start pattern on 32 instep stitches alternating between cc socks with the flk heel and mc as indicated in the stitch pattern after 18 pattern repeats 72 knit the sole stitches in plain stockinette this applies for all row row i start the shaping row on the foot of the sock of the mini gusset kgb at each end of sole stitches work 21 pattern repeats 84 row in this established mode every 2rd row 5 times 42 sole stitches work your preferred short row heel in row 85 this should in row 85 i do the flk heel on be a new row 1 and therefore worked in cc this way you ll 5+1+10+10+10+1+5 stitches achieve a cc heel without cutting yarn and continue in the round i then get rid off the mini-gusset continue in the round working 4 pattern repeats with by decreasing by 1 on each side pattern on instep stitches and plain stockinette on the back 5 times in every 3rd row 15 of the leg the former sole stitches row knit one row in next row r1 start working the pattern on all stitches established pattern 16 row © la maison de saba 2018 solid stitch lines page 2 of 3 v 1 1 knit 15 times the pattern row 60 row or to your preferred length minus about 1 inch in patterning ending with row 4 cut mc knit 1 row with cc in stockinette switch to size 2mm needle and work 10 row of 3x1 ribbing aligning your purl stitches with your slipped stitches #k1 p1 k2# repeat from # to # purl 1 row knit 4 row i very much like jeny s bind off using your preferred stretchy bindoff method surprisingly stretchy bind off jssbo weave in ends http //www knitty com/issuefal l09/featjssbo php enjoy © la maison de saba 2018 solid stitch lines page 3 of 3 v 1 1
